DOC.brief_summary: The clinical protocol clinical test device : 1 . Objective test : To verify function efficiency device . 2 . Test method procedure : Comparison Test . 3 . DUT : Transtek Glass Body Analyzer , Model : GBF-830 , GBF-835 , GBF-950 , SA-15 . 4 . Comparison device : Scaleman Body Fat Scales , FS-148BW1 ( Predicate Device ) . 5 . Study endpoint : Transtek device predicate device substantial equivalence . 6 . Statistical methodology use : Description statistical method . 7 . Result : Efficiencies Transtek device predicate device level .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Test Transtek Glass Body Analyzer
DOC.detailed_description: Hospital Information The data collect West China Medical College Clinical Investigator Team Wuhou District Hospital , No . 9 Tongzilin Road , Wuhou District , Chengdu 610041 , P. R. China . Investigator : Catharine Zhang , Nurse A ; Vivian Luo , Nurse B ; Dr. James Zhu , Sponsor . Contact Dr. James Zhu Tel : +86 1330 8036568 Used Equipments DUT ( Device Under Test ) : Transtek Glass Body Analyzer , GBF-830 , GBF-835 , GBF-950 , SA-15 . Reference Device : Scaleman Body Fat Scales , FS-148BW1 ( Predicate Device ) . Test Protocol 1 . Test Purpose : The aim clinical test collect weight , body fat , total body water , bone mass , muscle mass read value measure DUT reference device . Note : GBF-835 total body water , bone mass , muscle mass function . So collect weight body fat data . 2 . Target Subject : The subject database shall contain least 25 male 25 female subject 18 year old . Patient 's population analysis bellow . 3 . Test procedures 1 ) Record name , age , gender , height subject . 2 ) Let subject seat calmly two minute test , dry foot . 3 ) Use device measure weight , body fat , total body water , bone mass , muscle mass ; record reading value . 4 ) For subject , repeat 3 ) get 3 pair measurement . 5 ) Repeat step 1 ) 4 ) every device ( DUT : GBF-830 , GBF-835 , GBF-950 , SA-15 ; reference device : FS-148BW1 ) . 6 ) Repeat step 1 ) 5 ) subject . 5 . Note : 1 . No motion speaking allow measurement . 2 . All DUT use algorithm , number electrode contact patient body location ( foot ) , operate frequency . 3 . Test environment : Temperature : 20±1℃ ; Relative humidity : 40~50 % .
